meanings.definition: Of or relating to an antenna
meanings.sent1: The antennular device helped improve the signal reception.
meanings.sent2: The antennular properties of the device made it more efficient.
meanings.sent3: The antennular design of the gadget was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her antennular focus on the task at hand was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The antennular features of the tool were crucial for its functionality.

meanings.definition: Resembling or pertaining to an antenna
meanings.sent1: The antennular structure of the tower stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent2: The antennular shape of the sculpture was captivating.
meanings.sent3: The antennular appearance of the building caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: His antennular gestures during the speech were engaging.
meanings.sent5: The antennular pattern on the fabric added a unique touch.

meanings.sent1: The insect had an antennular that helped it sense its surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The antennular of the tiny creature twitched in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The antennular of the bug wiggled comically as it moved.
meanings.sent4: The antennular of the small creature was like a delicate sensor.
meanings.sent5: The antennular of the beetle was crucial for its navigation.
